headline: Assessing Fortive (FTV) Valuation After Recent Share Price Pullback And Recurring Revenue Focus
summary: Fortive stock reaction and recent performance Fortive (FTV) has been drawing fresh attention after recent share price moves, as investors weigh its $6,260.3m in revenue, $884.8m in net income, and a last close of $53.08 against its mixed return profile. See our latest analysis for Fortive. Recent trading has been choppy, with a 1-day share price return of 0.53% sitting against a 7-day share price decline of 3.00% and a 30-day share price decline of 5.11%. The 1-year total shareholder return...
